content.text:
# 11th Academy of Country Music Awards

(5 each)
| most_wins = Loretta Lynn (4)
| network = ABC
| host = Marty Robbins
| ratings =
| previous = 10th
| main = ACM
| next = 12th
}}
The 11th Academy of Country Music Awards ceremony was held on February 19, 1976, at the Hollywood Palladium, Los Angeles, California. It was hosted by Marty Robbins.
__TOC__
Winners and nominees
Winners are shown in bold.
{| class="wikitable"
! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Entertainer of the Year
! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Album of the Year
|-
| style="vertical-align:top" |
* Loretta Lynn
** Glen Campbell
** Roy Clark
** John Denver
** Mickey Gilley
| style="vertical-align:top" |
* 'Feelins' — Loretta Lynn and Conway Twitty'
** Before the Next Teardrop Falls — Freddy Fender
** ''Keep Movin' On — Merle Haggard
** Red Headed Stranger — Willie Nelson
** Rhinestone Cowboy — Glen Campbell
|-

! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Top Male Vocalist of the Year
|-

** Linda Ronstadt

| style="vertical-align:top" |

** Mickey Gilley
** Merle Haggard
** Willie Nelson
